description: If true, indicates a delete operation.
Prevents editing existing Professional Affiliation Types.

Professional_Affiliation_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Professional_Affiliation_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Professional_Affiliation_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The Professional Affiliation Type ID of the instance to be edited.

Professional_Affiliation_Type_Data.description: A unique ID for the Professional Affiliation Type.
The name of the Professional Affiliation Type.
